metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43113 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: iTextPDF in iText 7 and up to (excluding 4.4.13.3) 7.1.17 allows command injection via a CompareTool filename that is mishandled on the gs (aka Ghostscript) command line in GhostscriptHelper.java.

criterions.comment: libitext5-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
